document_class: Stimulus/Response Sequences User ticks the torrent tick box – the system will now query the torrent websites in its database when a search is started  The user enters the search term and starts the search – system sends queries to the torrent websites in its database based on the search term  The user sorts the search results by clicking once on a column header – the system sorts all results in descending/ascending order  The user clicks on the next page button – the system displays the next set of results for the search  There will be a tick box to allow the user to choose to include torrent searching in the search  If no results are found on a search, it will display the message "No results were found for this search
